boardgame.name: The U.S. Civil War
boardgame.description: The U.S. Civil War is a 2-player strategic-level war game of the American Civil War. The game covers the entire war from 1861-65 on a large 30_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; x 44_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; map area (2 mounted maps) of the Southeastern United States. Turns represent 3 months during the winter and 2 months during the summer, with four Action Phases to each turn._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Military forces are represented by generals and strength-points (SPs). Each SP represents approximately 5,000 soldiers. Game mechanics stress strategy, maneuver and leadership but details like ironclads, naval battles, leader promotions, forts, and commerce raiders are included._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Shorter scenarios are included that cover just 1861, 1862 and 1863._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players of Eric Lee Smith_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s The Civil War (VG) and Mark Herman_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s For the People (AH and GMT) will see many similarities between this game and those two benchmark games. Those two wonderful games inspired many of the rules and concepts used in this game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;CONTENTS:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; a rules booklet_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Two mounted maps (_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;30 x _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;44 play area)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Three die-cut counter sheets (9/16_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; playing pieces)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Two identical 11_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; x 17_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; Player Aid Cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Three 8.5_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; x 11_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; scenario cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; One deck of 30 Special Action Cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;TIME SCALE: 2-3 weeks per Phase; 4 Action Phase per turn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;MAP SCALE: 24 miles per hex_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;UNIT SCALE: Each Strength Point = 5,000 men_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;NUMBER OF PLAYERS: 2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;DESIGNER _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; DEVELOPER: Mark Simonitch_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;MAP ART: Mark Simonitch_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;COUNTER _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; CARD ART: Mark Simonitch _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Rodger B. MacGowan_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;(source: GMT website)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;RULES_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;FAQ_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

*** With every sale we donate a percentage to the Veterans Support Foundation (including this sale). *** Wargame Depot has donated over $7,500 to this wonderful cause thanks, largely, to the wonderful Boardgamegeek community. Thank you so much for your continued support of Wargame Depot which has allowed us to give generously to the VSF. Mint, in shrink copy available. No dings, no dents, or anything wrong with the game. Non-smoking environment and kept in a humidity-controlled location. $13 shipping to US - write me for a quote to the rest of the world. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m the owner of Wargame Depot so a purchase from me will always be packed professionally and I can accept Paypal, MO/Check, or MC/Visa/Discover/AMEX. And if you want this game plus anything else that I am selling on BGG, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll of course be happy to add other items on in order to save you on shipping! North Carolina residents pay 7% sales tax. Cheers, Jason PS: We have many Osprey books in stock not listed on BGG. The prices are well under publisher rates; if you are interested in them, please let me know!

GMT Games (GMT1506) The U.S. Civil War is a 2-player strategic-level war game of the American Civil War. The game covers the entire war from 1861-65 on a large 30_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; x 44_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; map area (2 mounted maps) of the Southeastern United States. Turns represent 3 months during the winter and 2 months during the summer, with four Action Phases to each turn. Military forces are represented by generals and strength-points (SPs). Each SP represents approximately 5,000 soldiers. Game mechanics stress strategy, maneuver and leadership but details like ironclads, naval battles, leader promotions, forts, and commerce raiders are included. Shorter scenarios are included that cover just 1861, 1862 and 1863. Players of Eric Lee Smith_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s The Civil War (VG) and Mark Herman_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s For the People (AH and GMT) will see many similarities between this game and those two benchmark games. Those two wonderful games inspired many of the rules and concepts used in this game.
All components in very good condition. Payment by Paypal or wire transfer.

GMT GAMES (GMT1506) The U.S. Civil War is a 2-player strategic-level war game of the American Civil War. The game covers the entire war from 1861-65 on a large 30_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; x 44_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; map area (2 mounted maps) of the Southeastern United States. Turns represent 3 months during the winter and 2 months during the summer, with four Action Phases to each turn. Military forces are represented by generals and strength-points (SPs). Each SP represents approximately 5,000 soldiers. Game mechanics stress strategy, maneuver and leadership but details like ironclads, naval battles, leader promotions, forts, and commerce raiders are included. Shorter scenarios are included that cover just 1861, 1862 and 1863. Players of Eric Lee Smith_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s The Civil War (VG) and Mark Herman_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s For the People (AH and GMT) will see many similarities between this game and those two benchmark games. Bought new in December 2015. Punched and played just once, not been out of the box since February. Everything is in excellent condition, the only slight signs usage being the rulebook cover which has lots of slight indents from thumbing through it so much! Next working day delivery, due to heavy weight, is £7.50.

If You live outside the EU You don´t have to pay the German VAT (we send You the new, lower price with the confirmation). We offer only goods that we have in stock, You can also visit our onlineshop www.gamers-hq.de for more games Payment may be made by Paypal (no extra fee) or bank transfer in advance.
